title: Pakistan thanks US for felicitations on election of Shehbaz Sharif
content:
In a statement, a spokesperson of Foreign Office said, “We thank the United States for the message of felicitations on election of Prime Minister Mian Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif.”“Pakistan and the U.S. have had a long-standing, broad-based and mutually-beneficial relationship, that we look forward to further deepen and solidify. This is important for peace and development in the region and beyond,” he added.
